channel.title: Friendly NPC's
channel.description:
I have a problem here,
for some reason, i cannot attack rabbits(lvl2), dwarves(lvl17), but i can attack zombies(lvl13), i kinda figured that these must be friendly of nature, making me unable to attack.
Heres a report of what happens, Whatever weapon i'm wielding, i click the npc, and attack it. I walk up to it, the player stops, and then nothing. If i attack a zombie however, i either approach or stay at distance, depending on attack type, weapon type, and i start attacking.
Any ideas of how to fix this? Its really a thorn in my eye right now. Rep++ ;)
